text: The 2011–12 Liga IV Alba was the 44th season of the Liga IV Alba, the fourth tier of the Romanian football league system. The season began on 20 August 2011 and ended on 2 June 2012. Europa Alba Iulia became the county champion in the last round and will play a promotion play-off for Liga III. == Team changes == ===To Liga IV Alba=== Relegated from Liga III * — Promoted from Liga V Alba * Flamura Roșie Rădești. * CIL Blaj * Sportul Sebeș. ===From Liga IV Alba=== Promoted to Liga III * — Relegated to Liga V Alba * Recolta Galda de Jos * Perla Jidvei ===Other changes=== * Mureșul Oarda de Jos was excluded from Liga IV. * Olimpia Aiud was spared from relegatioin. ==League table== ==Promotion play-off== Champions of Liga IV – Alba County face champions of Liga IV – Cluj County. |} Europa Alba Iulia promoted to 2012–13 Liga III. ==See also== ===Main Leagues=== * 2011–12 Liga I * 2011–12 Liga II * 2011–12 Liga III * 2011–12 Liga IV ===County Leagues (Liga IV series)=== * 2011–12 Liga IV Arad * 2011–12 Liga IV Botoșani * 2011–12 Liga IV Prahova * 2011–12 Liga IV Suceava * 2011–12 Liga IV Teleorman ==References== ==External links== * Official website Category:Sport in Alba County
title: 2011–12 Liga IV Alba
